title: Jelani Cobb
description: Samantha Bee talks to journalist Jelani Cobb about taking over Selena Gomez's Instagram, the power of police unions, and what he'd spend his time talking about if racism was finally over. A girl can dream!
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
